results.text: You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.92b85c33a17ab487]{Face Death}.

You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.92b85c33a17ab487]{Face Death}.

You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).
You are battered but still standing.
